page.title: 02Transport
page.content: There are quite a few{bus stops}in East Halton. There is a bus stop in King Street at a letter box near the {lorry yard,}there is one outside the school and one outside the Post Offfice. There is a bus which takes the chldren to Immingham Comprehensive school. It stops at Magers lorry yard and outside the Post Office. Not many people use buses because most people have cars. People without a car find it is difficult to go to Grimsby or Immingham because there are not many buses. I think we should have more buses because old people can't travel. The nearest{railway station}is near {Thornton Abbey.}It is on the branch line to Barton. Not many trains use that line. More trains stop at {Habrough station}but it is further away.
